hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive

Class Buffer.WithSizeSkip<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Buffer.WithSizeSkip<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the elements
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable<List<T>>
    Enclosing class:
    Buffer

    public static final class Buffer.WithSizeSkip<T>
extends Object
implements Observable<List<T>>
    Project the source sequence to potentially overlapping buffers whose start is determined by skip and lengths by size.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2013.01.13.
